arts.ttl: Champions League | Inter Milan 4-0 Red Star: Match Report
arts.sum: Inter Milan put on a commanding performance in their UEFA Champions League group stage match, thrashing Red Star 4-0 at the San Siro. The victory was spearheaded by an impressive display from Mehdi Taremi, who contributed two assists and converted a penalty. The match began with a spectacular free-kick goal from Hakan Calhanoglu, marking his first direct free-kick score for Inter. This set the tone for what would be a dominant performance by the Nerazzurri. Despite having two goals disallowed for offside early in the game, Inter maintained their pressure.
